items.sentence: Tom was fired after being caught playing Tetris at work.
Tom died just as he was trying to say something to Mary.
Stop beating around the bush and get right to the point.
I just heard that Tom and Mary are going to get married.
Tom is the only one who\'s likely to be able to do that.
Tom said goodbye to his friends and got on the airplane.
Tom said that he wanted to learn how to swear in French.
Beer is not really so unhealthy, at least in moderation.
You should\'ve apologized to Tom for your rude behavior.
You\'d better take your umbrella, just in case it rains.
